title: Break This Habit When Communicating Software Architecture | Engineering Leadership
description: Don't try to blow me away with your technical architecture. It's not working.

title: The 3.5 Things to Consider When Picking Technologies | Engineering Leadership
description: If you're a software engineering leader, you're gonna have to make technology choices. Here are 3 key things to consider and 1 pro-tip for guidance.

title: The Secret to Constant Dev Team Innovation | Engineering Leadership
description: As a company matures, it can be tough to balance building new features and maintaining the product capabilities you've already built. This video describes the Daily, Weekly, and Yearly approaches we took in my company to ensure we were always innovating in our software product suite.
